idea-plugin.name: Save Point
idea-plugin.description: The SavePoint plugin enhances project management by allowing developers to create, view, and manage save points within their projects. Key features include: - Add custom save points with unique names and messages. - Rollback to any previously created save point. - Undo the most recent rollback operation. - Delete save points that are no longer needed. - View and manage all save points through an intuitive tool window interface. - Automatic refresh of the IDE to reflect changes immediately.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Initial release of SavePoint Plugin: - Save points creation, rollback, and deletion. - Undo rollback functionality. - Integrated tool window for easy management. - IDE refresh feature.
